title: Fix: Duplicate sprite name warning
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Gap from phase-0-gaps.md:

Spec requirement (docs/spec/format.md - Error Handling):
- Duplicate name â†’ Last definition wins â†’ Warning: 'Duplicate sprite name X, using latest'

Current behavior: Both sprites rendered, no warning.

Required fix in src/cli.rs:
1. Track seen sprite names in a HashSet
2. When duplicate detected:
   - Lenient mode: warn and skip (keep first, not last per spec clarification)
   - OR warn and replace (keep last per spec)
   - Strict mode: error and fail

Verification:
```
./target/release/pxl render tests/fixtures/lenient/duplicate_name.jsonl -o /tmp/dupe.png 2>&1 | grep -i warning
```
Should show: Warning: Duplicate sprite name 'dupe', using latest
close_reason: Implemented duplicate sprite name detection with warning. Latest definition wins in lenient mode, fails in strict mode.

title: Task 7.3: Website Preview Component
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

- src/preview.ts with Preview interface
- render(jsonl), getImageData(), getCanvas() methods
- Debounced rendering (100ms)
- Integer scaling for pixel art (nearest-neighbor)
- Checkered background for transparency
- imageSmoothingEnabled = false

CSS:
- image-rendering: pixelated
- Checkered background pattern

Verification:
- Type valid pixelsrc JSONL
- Preview updates in real-time
- Pixel art is crisp (not blurred)

Depends on: Task 7.1
close_reason: Implemented canvas-based preview component with render(jsonl), getImageData(), getCanvas() methods. Features debounced rendering (100ms), integer scaling for pixel art, checkered transparency background, and imageSmoothingEnabled=false. Updated main.ts to use Preview component with real-time updates.

title: Allow compositions to reference other compositions in sprite maps
description: Currently compositions can only reference sprites in their sprite maps. It would be useful to allow referencing other compositions, enabling hierarchical scene building (e.g., building compositions that can be tiled into a city composition). The referenced composition would be rendered and placed like a sprite tile.
